h4.p: [21] yo ^a^M0.0279^ea^ ^a^V0.0087^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ^a^T0.0324^ea^ {yo ve (syā0)} uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi {osadhebhi (ka0)}.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ {jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0), jiṇṇamivā tacaṃ (?)} purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo rāgamudacchidā asesaṃ, bhisapupphaṃva saroruhaṃ {sareruhaṃ (ka0)} vigayha.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ, purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo ^a^V0.0088^ea^ taṇhamudacchidā asesaṃ, saritaṃ sīghasaraṃ visosayitvā.
[22] so ^a^T0.0325^ea^ bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo ^a^M0.0280^ea^ mānamudabbadhī asesaṃ, naḷasetuṃva sudubbalaṃ mahogho.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo nājjhagamā bhavesu sāraṃ, vicinaṃ pupphamiva {pupphamiva (bahūsu)} udumbaresu.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yassantarato na santi kopā, itibhavābhavatañca {itibbhavābhavatañca (ka0)} vītivatto.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yassa ^a^P0.0002^ea^ vitakkā vidhūpitā, ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā asesā.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ accagamā imaṃ papañcaṃ.
[22] so ^a^T0.0326^ea^ bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti ñatvā {utvā (syā0 pī0 ka0)} loke.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītalobho.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo ^a^M0.0281^ea^ nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītarāgo.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītadoso.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo ^a^V0.0089^ea^ nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītamoho.
[22] so ^a^T0.0327^ea^ bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yassānusayā na santi keci, mūlā ca akusalā samūhatāse.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yassa darathajā na santi keci, oraṃ āgamanāya paccayāse.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yassa vanathajā na santi keci, vinibandhāya bhavāya hetukappā.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[21] yo ^a^P0.0003^ea^ nīvaraṇe pahāya pañca, anigho tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo.
[22] so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ..
[22] channā kuṭi āhito gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva''..

[21] ``lābhā ^a^M0.0284^ea^ vata no anappakā, ye mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasāma.
[22] saraṇaṃ taṃ upema cakkhuma, satthā no hohi tuvaṃ mahāmuni..
[21] ``gopī ca ahañca assavā, brahmacariyaṃ {brahmacariya (ka0)} sugate carāmase.
[22] jātimaraṇassa ^a^T0.0331^ea^ pāragū {pāragā (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}, dukkhassantakarā bhavāmase''..
[27] gomā {gomiko (sī0 pī0), gopiko (syā0 kaṃ0), gopiyo (ka0)} gohi tatheva nandati.
[22] upadhī hi narassa nandanā, na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhi''..
[22] upadhī hi narassa socanā, na hi so socati yo nirūpadhī''ti..
[21] sabbesu ^a^V0.0092^ea^ bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ.
[22] na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] saṃsaggajātassa ^a^M0.0285^ea^ bhavanti snehā, snehanvayaṃ ^a^T0.0332^ea^ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti.
[22] ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto.
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave {sandhave (ka0)} pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.
[22] vaṃsakkaḷīrova ^a^P0.0007^ea^ {vaṃsakaḷīrova (sī0), vaṃsākaḷīrova (syā0 kaṃ0 pī0), vaṃsekaḷīrova (niddesa)} sajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] migo araññamhi yathā abaddho {abandho (syā0 kaṃ0)}, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya.
[22] viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya.
[22] anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] khiḍḍā ^a^T0.0333^ea^ ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu ca vipulaṃ hoti pemaṃ.
[21] cātuddiso ^a^M0.0286^ea^ appaṭigho ca hoti, santussamāno itarītarena.
[22] parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke, atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā.
[22] appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] oropayitvā ^a^V0.0093^ea^ gihibyañjanāni {gihivyañjanāni (syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}, sañchinnapatto {saṃsīnapatto (sī0)} yathā koviḷāro.
[22] chetvāna ^a^P0.0008^ea^ vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ.
[22] abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā..
[21] no ^a^T0.0334^ea^ ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ.
[22] rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo..
[21] addhā pasaṃsāma sahāyasampadaṃ, seṭṭhā samā sevitabbā sahāyā.
[22] ete aladdhā anavajjabhojī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] saṅghaṭṭamānāni duve bhujasmiṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] evaṃ ^a^M0.0287^ea^ dutiyena {dutiyena (sabbattha)} sahā mamassa, vācābhilāpo abhisajjanā vā.
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
[22] ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] ītī ^a^T0.0335^ea^ ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca sallañca bhayañca metaṃ.
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] sītañca ^a^P0.0009^ea^ uṇhañca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vātātape ḍaṃsasarīsape {ḍaṃsasiriṃsape (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} ca.
[21] nāgova yūthāni vivajjayitvā, sañjātakhandho padumī uḷāro.
[22] yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃ {vihare (sī0 pī0 niddesa)} araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] aṭṭhānataṃ ^a^V0.0094^ea^ saṅgaṇikāratassa, yaṃ phassaye {phussaye (syā0)} sāmayikaṃ vimuttiṃ.
[22] ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] nirāsayo {nirāsāso (ka0)} sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha, anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ.
[22] sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] bahussutaṃ ^a^P0.0010^ea^ dhammadharaṃ bhajetha, mittaṃ uḷāraṃ paṭibhānavantaṃ.
[22] aññāya atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca loke, analaṅkaritvā anapekkhamāno.
[22] vibhūsanaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavāni {bandhavāni ca (pī0)}.
[22] hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] saṅgo ^a^T0.0337^ea^ eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyo.
[22] gaḷo eso iti ñatvā mutīmā {matīmā (syā0 ka0)}, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] okkhittacakkhū ^a^M0.0289^ea^ na ca pādalolo, guttindriyo rakkhitamānasāno.

[21] rasesu gedhaṃ akaraṃ alolo, anaññaposī sapadānacārī.
[22] kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto {appaṭibandhacitto (ka0)}, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] pahāya ^a^T0.0338^ea^ pañcāvaraṇāni cetaso, upakkilese byapanujja sabbe.
[22] anissito chetva {chetvā (syā0 pī0 ka0)} sinehadosaṃ {snehadosaṃ (ka0)}, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassaṃ.
[22] laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[22] ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] taṇhakkhayaṃ ^a^M0.0290^ea^ patthayamappamatto, aneḷamūgo {anelamūgo (syā0 pī0 ka0)} sutavā satīmā.
[22] saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] sīhova ^a^P0.0012^ea^ ^a^T0.0339^ea^ saddesu asantasanto, vātova jālamhi asajjamāno.
[22] padumaṃva toyena alippamāno {alimpamāno (sī0 syā0 ka0)}, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī.
[22] sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle.
[22] sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..
[21] rāgañca ^a^V0.0096^ea^ dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, sandālayitvāna saṃyojanāni.
[21] bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā.
[22] attaṭṭhapaññā asucī manussā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0291^ea^ ^a^T0.0340^ea^ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ ^a^P0.0013^ea^ {dakkhiṇagirismiṃ (ka0)} ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme. tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa pañcamattāni naṅgalasatāni payuttāni honti vappakāle. atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto tenupasaṅkami. tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati. atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.

[03] addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ. disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``ahaṃ kho, samaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmi. tvampi, samaṇa, kasassu ca vapassu ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassū''ti.

[03] ``ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī''ti. ``na kho pana mayaṃ {na kho pana samaṇa (syā0)} passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṃ vā naṅgalaṃ vā phālaṃ vā pācanaṃ vā balibadde {balivadde (sī0 pī0), balībadde (?)} vā. atha ca pana bhavaṃ gotamo evamāha -- `ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ^a^T0.0341^ea^ ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī'''ti.
[03] atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``kassako ^a^V0.0097^ea^ paṭijānāsi, na ca passāma te kasiṃ.
[22] kasiṃ no pucchito brūhi, yathā jānemu te kasiṃ''..
[21] ``saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ.
[22] hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ..
[22] saccaṃ karomi niddānaṃ, soraccaṃ me pamocanaṃ..
[22] gacchati anivattantaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati..

[03] atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā pāyasaṃ {pāyāsaṃ (sabbattha)} vaḍḍhetvā bhagavato upanāmesi -- ``bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamo pāyasaṃ. kassako bhavaṃ; yaṃ hi bhavaṃ gotamo amatapphalaṃ {amatapphalampi (saṃ0 ni0 1.197)} kasiṃ kasatī''ti.
[21] ``gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyyaṃ, sampassataṃ brāhmaṇa nesa dhammo.
[22] gāthābhigītaṃ panudanti buddhā, dhamme satī brāhmaṇa vuttiresā..
[22] annena pānena upaṭṭhahassu, khettaṃ hi taṃ puññapekkhassa hotī''ti..

[03] ``atha ^a^P0.0015^ea^ kassa cāhaṃ, bho gotama, imaṃ pāyasaṃ dammī''ti? ``na khvāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā. tena hi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, taṃ pāyasaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0098^ea^ kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṃ pāyasaṃ appāṇake udake opilāpesi. atha kho so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati {sandhūmāyati sampadhūmāyati (syā0)}. seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṃ santatto {divasasantatto (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati; evameva so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.

[03] atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā ^a^M0.0293^ea^ bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ ^a^T0.0343^ea^, bho gotama! seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti {dakkhintīti (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}; evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito. esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi ^a^P0.0016^ea^ dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca, labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada''nti.

[03] alattha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ. acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ -- brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi. ``khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā''ti abbhaññāsi. aññataro ca {aññataro ca kho (sī0 pī0), aññataro kho (syā0 kaṃ0 ka0)} panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
[22] dvipaduttamaṃ {dipaduttamaṃ (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} sārathīnaṃ pavaraṃ, kati loke samaṇā tadiṅgha brūhi''..
[22] maggajino maggadesako ca, magge jīvati yo ca maggadūsī''..
[22] magge jīvati me brūhi puṭṭho, atha me āvikarohi maggadūsiṃ'' {maggadūsī (ka0)}..
[22] lokassa sadevakassa netā, tādiṃ maggajinaṃ vadanti buddhā..
[21] ``paramaṃ paramanti yodha ñatvā, akkhāti ^a^T0.0345^ea^ vibhajate idheva dhammaṃ.
[27] taṃ kaṅkhachidaṃ muniṃ anejaṃ, dutiyaṃ bhikkhunamāhu maggadesiṃ..
[21] ``yo dhammapade sudesite, magge jīvati saññato satīmā.
[22] māyāvī asaññato palāpo, patirūpena caraṃ sa maggadūsī..
[21] ``ete ca paṭivijjhi yo gahaṭṭho, sutavā ariyasāvako sapañño.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V0.0103^ea^ ^a^P0.0021^ea^ ^a^T0.0349^ea^ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesane aggi pajjalito hoti āhuti paggahitā. atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
[03] addasā kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ. disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``tatreva {atreva (syā0 ka0)}, muṇḍaka; tatreva, samaṇaka; tatreva, vasalaka tiṭṭhāhī''ti.

[21] ``kodhano ^a^M0.0298^ea^ upanāhī ca, pāpamakkhī ca yo naro.

[03] evaṃ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane. atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``nikkhama, samaṇā''ti. ``sādhāvuso''ti ^a^M0.0306^ea^ bhagavā nikkhami. ``pavisa, samaṇā''ti. ``sādhāvuso''ti bhagavā pāvisi.

[03] dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``nikkhama, samaṇā''ti. ``sādhāvuso''ti ^a^T0.0360^ea^ bhagavā nikkhami. ``pavisa, samaṇā''ti. ``sādhāvuso''ti bhagavā pāvisi.

[03] ``pañhaṃ ^a^V0.0112^ea^ taṃ, samaṇa, pucchissāmi. sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī''ti.

[03] ``na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya. api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī''ti. atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ sukhamāvahāti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^T0.0381^ea^ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. atha kho sambahulā kosalakā brāhmaṇamahāsālā jiṇṇā vuḍḍhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ -- ``sandissanti nu kho, bho gotama, etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ brāhmaṇadhamme''ti? ``na kho, brāhmaṇā, sandissanti etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ brāhmaṇadhamme''ti. ``sādhu no bhavaṃ gotamo porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ brāhmaṇadhammaṃ bhāsatu, sace bhoto gotamassa agarū''ti. ``tena hi, brāhmaṇā, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī''ti. ``evaṃ, bho''ti kho te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavato paccassosuṃ. bhagavā etadavoca --

[22] etesu taṇhaṃ mākāsi, mā lokaṃ punarāgami..
[03] itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ imāhi gāthāhi abhiṇhaṃ ovadatīti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V0.0135^ea^ ^a^T0.0391^ea^ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye. tena kho pana samayena āyasmato vaṅgīsassa upajjhāyo nigrodhakappo nāma thero aggāḷave cetiye aciraparinibbuto hoti. atha kho āyasmato vaṅgīsassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi -- ``parinibbuto nu kho me upajjhāyo udāhu no parinibbuto''ti? atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ^a^P0.0060^ea^ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi -- `parinibbuto ^a^M0.0330^ea^ nu kho me upajjhāyo, udāhu no parinabbuto'''ti. atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``pucchāma {pucchāmi (ka0)} satthāramanomapaññaṃ, diṭṭheva dhamme yo vicikicchānaṃ chettā.
[22] aggāḷave kālamakāsi bhikkhu, ñāto yasassī abhinibbutatto..
[21] ``nigrodhakappo ^a^T0.0392^ea^ iti tassa nāmaṃ, tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa.
[22] so taṃ namassaṃ acari mutyapekkho, āraddhavīriyo daḷhadhammadassī..
[21] ``taṃ sāvakaṃ sakya {sakka (sī0 syā0 pī0)} mayampi sabbe, aññātumicchāma samantacakkhu.
[22] samavaṭṭhitā no savanāya sotā, tuvaṃ no satthā tvamanuttarosi..
[21] ``chindeva no vicikicchaṃ brūhi metaṃ, parinibbutaṃ vedaya bhūripañña.
[22] majjheva {majjhe ca (syā0 ka0)} no bhāsa samantacakkhu, sakkova devāna sahassanetto..
[21] ``ye keci ganthā idha mohamaggā, aññāṇapakkhā vicikicchaṭhānā.
[22] tathāgataṃ ^a^P0.0061^ea^ patvā na te bhavanti, cakkhuñhi etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ..
[21] ``no ^a^V0.0136^ea^ ce hi jātu puriso kilese, vāto yathā abbhadhanaṃ vihāne.
[22] tamovassa nivuto sabbaloko, na ^a^T0.0393^ea^ jotimantopi narā tapeyyuṃ..
[21] ``dhīrā ^a^M0.0331^ea^ ca pajjotakarā bhavanti, taṃ taṃ ahaṃ vīra {dhīra (sī0 syā0)} tatheva maññe.
[22] vipassinaṃ jānamupāgamumhā {jānamupagamamhā (sī0 syā0)}, parisāsu no āvikarohi kappaṃ..
[21] ``khippaṃ giraṃ eraya vaggu vagguṃ, haṃsova paggayha saṇikaṃ {saṇiṃ (syā0 pī0)} nikūja.
[22] bindussarena suvikappitena, sabbeva te ujjugatā suṇoma..
[22] na kāmakāro hi puthujjanānaṃ, saṅkheyyakāro ca {saṅkhayyakārova (ka0)} tathāgatānaṃ..
[22] ayamañjalī pacchimo suppaṇāmito, mā mohayī jānamanomapañña..
[22] vāriṃ yathā ^a^P0.0062^ea^ ghammani ghammatatto, vācābhikaṅkhāmi ^a^T0.0394^ea^ sutaṃ pavassa {sutassa vassa (syā0)}..
[21] ``yadatthikaṃ {yadatthiyaṃ (pī0), yadatthitaṃ (ka0)} brahmacariyaṃ acarī, kappāyano kaccissa taṃ amoghaṃ.
[22] nibbāyi so ādu saupādiseso, yathā vimutto ahu taṃ suṇoma''..
[22] amoghaṃ kira me puṭṭhaṃ, na maṃ vañcesi brāhmaṇo..
[22] acchidā maccuno jālaṃ, tataṃ māyāvino daḷhaṃ..
[26] nikkhamma gharā panujja kāme, kathaṃ bhikkhu
[21] ``rāgaṃ vinayetha mānusesu, dibbesu kāmesu cāpi bhikkhu.
[22] atikkamma bhavaṃ samecca dhammaṃ, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[22] saṃyojaniyehi vippamutto, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0138^ea^ so upadhīsu sārameti, ādānesu vineyya chandarāgaṃ.
[22] so anissito anaññaneyyo, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``vacasā ^a^P0.0064^ea^ manasā ca kammunā ca, aviruddho sammā viditvā dhammaṃ.
[21] ``yo vandati manti nuṇṇameyya {nunnameyya (?)}, akkuṭṭhopi na sandhiyetha bhikkhu.
[22] laddhā parabhojanaṃ na majje, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``lobhañca bhavañca vippahāya, virato chedanabandhanā ca {chedanabandhanato (sī0 syā0)} bhikkhu.
[22] so tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``sāruppaṃ ^a^T0.0397^ea^ attano viditvā, no ca bhikkhu hiṃseyya kañci loke.
[22] yathā tathiyaṃ viditvā dhammaṃ, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``yassānusayā ^a^M0.0334^ea^ na santi keci, mūlā ca {mūlā (sī0 syā0)} akusalā samūhatāse.
[22] so nirāso {nirāsayo (sī0), nirāsaso (syā0)} anāsisāno {anāsayāno (sī0 pī0), anāsasāno (syā0)}, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[22] danto parinibbuto ṭhitatto, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``saddho sutavā niyāmadassī, vaggagatesu na vaggasāri dhīro.
[22] lobhaṃ dosaṃ vineyya paṭighaṃ, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[22] sabbāyatanehi vippamutto, sammā so loke paribbajeyya..
[21] ``aññāya ^a^V0.0139^ea^ padaṃ samecca dhammaṃ, vivaṭaṃ disvāna pahānamāsavānaṃ.
[22] sabbupadhīnaṃ parikkhayāno {parikkhayā (pī0)}, sammā so loke paribbajeyya''..
[21] ``addhā ^a^M0.0335^ea^ hi bhagavā tatheva etaṃ, yo so evaṃvihārī danto bhikkhu.
[22] sabbasaṃyojanayogavītivatto ^a^P0.0066^ea^ {sabbasaṃyojaniye ca vītivatto (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, sammā so loke paribbajeyyā''ti..

[03] evaṃ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. atha kho dhammiko upāsako ^a^T0.0399^ea^ pañcahi upāsakasatehi saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho dhammiko upāsako bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ gotama bhūripañña, kathaṃkaro sāvako sādhu hoti.
[22] yo vā agārā anagārameti, agārino vā panupāsakāse..
[22] na catthi tulyo nipuṇatthadassī, tuvañhi buddhaṃ pavaraṃ vadanti..
[21] ``sabbaṃ tuvaṃ ñāṇamavecca dhammaṃ, pakāsesi satte anukampamāno.
[21] ``āgañchi ^a^P0.0067^ea^ te santike nāgarājā, erāvaṇo nāma jinoti sutvā.
[22] sopi tayā mantayitvājjhagamā, sādhūti sutvāna patītarūpo..
[21] ``rājāpi ^a^M0.0336^ea^ ^a^V0.0140^ea^ ^a^T0.0400^ea^ taṃ vessavaṇo kuvero, upeti dhammaṃ paripucchamāno.
[22] tassāpi tvaṃ pucchito brūsi dhīra, so cāpi sutvāna patītarūpo..
[21] ``ye kecime titthiyā vādasīlā, ājīvakā vā yadi vā nigaṇṭhā.
[22] paññāya taṃ nātitaranti sabbe, ṭhito vajantaṃ viya sīghagāmiṃ..
[21] ``ye kecime brāhmaṇā vādasīlā, vuddhā cāpi brāhmaṇā santi keci.
[22] sabbe tayi atthabaddhā bhavanti, ye cāpi aññe vādino maññamānā..
[21] ``ayañhi dhammo nipuṇo sukho ca, yoyaṃ tayā bhagavā suppavutto.
[22] tameva sabbepi {sabbe mayaṃ (syā0)} sussūsamānā, taṃ no vada pucchito buddhaseṭṭha..
[21] ``sabbepi me bhikkhavo sannisinnā, upāsakā cāpi tatheva sotuṃ.
[22] suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhaṃ, subhāsitaṃ ^a^T0.0401^ea^ vāsavasseva devā''..
[21] ``suṇātha me bhikkhavo sāvayāmi vo, dhammaṃ dhutaṃ tañca carātha sabbe.
[22] iriyāpathaṃ ^a^P0.0068^ea^ pabbajitānulomikaṃ, sevetha naṃ atthadaso mutīmā..
[21] ``no ve vikāle vicareyya bhikkhu, gāme ca piṇḍāya careyya kāle.
[22] akālacāriñhi sajanti saṅgā, tasmā vikāle na caranti buddhā..
[21] ``rūpā ^a^M0.0337^ea^ ca saddā ca rasā ca gandhā, phassā ca ye sammadayanti satte.
[22] etesu dhammesu vineyya chandaṃ, kālena so pavise pātarāsaṃ..
[21] ``piṇḍañca bhikkhu samayena laddhā, eko paṭikkamma raho nisīde.
[22] ajjhattacintī na mano bahiddhā, nicchāraye saṅgahitattabhāvo..
[21] ``sacepi so sallape sāvakena, aññena vā kenaci bhikkhunā vā.
[22] dhammaṃ ^a^T0.0402^ea^ paṇītaṃ tamudāhareyya, na pesuṇaṃ nopi parūpavādaṃ..
[21] ``vādañhi ^a^V0.0141^ea^ eke paṭiseniyanti, na te pasaṃsāma parittapaññe.
[22] tato tato ne pasajanti saṅgā, cittañhi te tattha gamenti dūre..
[22] sutvāna dhammaṃ sugatena desitaṃ, saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvako..
[21] ``tasmā hi piṇḍe sayanāsane ca, āpe ca saṅghāṭirajūpavāhane.
[22] etesu ^a^P0.0069^ea^ dhammesu anūpalitto, bhikkhu yathā pokkhare vāribindu..
[21] ``gahaṭṭhavattaṃ pana vo vadāmi, yathākaro sāvako sādhu hoti.
[22] na hesa {na heso (sī0)} labbhā sapariggahena, phassetuṃ yo kevalo bhikkhudhammo..
[21] ``pāṇaṃ ^a^M0.0338^ea^ na hane {na hāne (sī0)} na ca ghātayeyya, na cānujaññā hanataṃ paresaṃ.
[22] sabbesu ^a^T0.0403^ea^ bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, ye thāvarā ye ca tasā santi {tasanti (sī0 pī0)} loke..
[21] ``tato adinnaṃ parivajjayeyya, kiñci kvaci sāvako bujjhamāno.
[22] na hāraye harataṃ nānujaññā, sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjayeyya..
[22] asambhuṇanto pana brahmacariyaṃ, parassa dāraṃ na atikkameyya..
[21] ``sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā, ekassa veko {ceto (sī0 syā0)} na musā bhaṇeyya.
[22] na bhāṇaye bhaṇataṃ nānujaññā, sabbaṃ abhūtaṃ parivajjayeyya..
[21] ``majjañca pānaṃ na samācareyya, dhammaṃ imaṃ rocaye yo gahaṭṭho.
[22] na pāyaye pivataṃ nānujaññā, ummādanantaṃ iti naṃ viditvā..
[21] ``madā hi pāpāni karonti bālā, kārenti caññepi jane pamatte.
[22] etaṃ ^a^P0.0070^ea^ ^a^T0.0404^ea^ apuññāyatanaṃ vivajjaye, ummādanaṃ mohanaṃ bālakantaṃ..
[21] ``pāṇaṃ ^a^V0.0142^ea^ na hane na cādinnamādiye, musā na bhāse na ca majjapo siyā.
[22] abrahmacariyā virameyya methunā, rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojanaṃ..
[21] ``mālaṃ ^a^M0.0339^ea^ na dhāre na ca gandhamācare, mañce chamāyaṃ va sayetha santhate.
[21] ``tato ca pāto upavutthuposatho, annena pānena ca bhikkhusaṅghaṃ.
[21] ``dhammena mātāpitaro bhareyya, payojaye dhammikaṃ so vaṇijjaṃ.
[22] etaṃ ^a^T0.0405^ea^ gihī vattayamappamatto, sayampabhe nāma upeti deve''ti..
[22] dhammacariyañca brāhmaṇo {kapilo brāhmaṇopi ca (syā0 ka0)}, nāvā kiṃsīlamuṭṭhānaṃ..
[21] rāhulo puna kappo ca, paribbājaniyaṃ tathā.
[22] kuhiṃ gamissati bhikkhu, kattha vāso bhavissati..
[21] disvāna vāsūpagataṃ, tayo {tato (sī0 pī0)} dūtā upāvisuṃ.
[22] tesu ekova {eko ca dūto (sī0 syā0 pī0)} āgantvā, rājino paṭivedayi..
[21] sa yānabhūmiṃ yāyitvā, yānā oruyha khattiyo.
[21] nisajja rājā sammodi, kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ tato.
[21] ``yuvā ca daharo cāsi, paṭhamuppattiko {paṭhamuppattiyā (sī0), paṭhamuppattito (syā0)} susu.
[22] dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassu, jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito''..
[22] tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, na kāme abhipatthayaṃ..
[22] padhānāya gamissāmi, ettha me rañjatī mano''ti..
[22] jīva bho jīvitaṃ seyyo, jīvaṃ puññāni kāhasi..
[22] pahūtaṃ cīyate puññaṃ, kiṃ padhānena kāhasi..
[22] imā gāthā bhaṇaṃ māro, aṭṭhā buddhassa santike..
[22] ``pamattabandhu pāpima, yenatthena {senatthena (?), attano atthena (aṭṭha0 saṃvaṇṇanā)} idhāgato..
[21] ``aṇumattopi ^a^V0.0146^ea^ {aṇumattenapi (sī0 syā0)} puññena, attho mayhaṃ na vijjati.
[22] yesañca attho puññena, te māro vattumarahati..
[21] ``atthi saddhā tathā {tato (sī0 pī0), tapo (syā0 ka0)} vīriyaṃ, paññā ca mama vijjati.
[22] bhiyyo sati ca paññā ca, samādhi mama tiṭṭhati..
[22] kāmesu {kāme (sī0 syā0)} nāpekkhate cittaṃ, passa sattassa suddhataṃ..
[21] ``kāmā ^a^P0.0076^ea^ te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati.
[22] tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati..
[21] ``pañcamaṃ {pañcamī (sī0 pī0)} thinamiddhaṃ te, chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati.
[22] sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo..
[21] ``lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso.
[22] yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānati..
[22] na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukhaṃ..
[22] saṅgāme me mataṃ seyyo, yaṃ ce jīve parājito..
[22] tañca maggaṃ na jānanti, yena gacchanti subbatā..
[22] yuddhāya paccuggacchāmi, mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^T0.0410^ea^ te taṃ nappasahati, senaṃ loko sadevako.
[22] taṃ ^a^P0.0077^ea^ te paññāya bhecchāmi {gacchāmi (sī0), vecchāmi (syā0), vajjhāmi (ka0)}, āmaṃ pattaṃva asmanā {pakkaṃva amunā (ka0)}..
[22] raṭṭhā raṭṭhaṃ vicarissaṃ, sāvake vinayaṃ puthū..
[22] akāmassa {akāmā (ka0)} te gamissanti, yattha gantvā na socare''..
[22] apettha muduṃ {mudu (sī0)} vindema, api assādanā siyā..

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0344^ea^ ^a^V0.0148^ea^ me sutaṃ -- eka samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū ^a^T0.0411^ea^ āmantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ. bhagavā etadavoca --

[03] ``catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, na dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ. katamehi catūhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsati no dubbhāsitaṃ, dhammaṃyeva bhāsati no adhammaṃ, piyaṃyeva bhāsati no appiyaṃ, saccaṃyeva bhāsati no alikaṃ. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūna''nti. idamavoca bhagavā. idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ.
[22] piyaṃ bhaṇe nāppiyaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ, saccaṃ bhaṇe nālikaṃ taṃ catuttha''nti..

[03] atha ^a^P0.0079^ea^ kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``paṭibhāti maṃ bhagavā, paṭibhāti maṃ sugatā''ti. ``paṭibhātu taṃ vaṅgīsā''ti bhagavā avoca. atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi --
[22] pare ^a^T0.0412^ea^ ca na vihiṃseyya, sā ve vācā subhāsitā..
[22] yaṃ anādāya pāpāni, paresaṃ bhāsate piyaṃ..
[21] ``saccaṃ ve amatā vācā, esa dhammo sanantano.
[22] sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, āhu santo patiṭṭhitā..

[03] evaṃ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati sundarikāya nadiyā tīre. tena kho pana samayena sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo sundarikāya nadiyā tīre aggiṃ juhati, aggihuttaṃ paricarati. atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo aggiṃ juhitvā aggihuttaṃ paricaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā samantā catuddisā anuvilokesi -- ``ko nu kho imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyā''ti? addasā kho sundarikabhāradvājo ^a^P0.0080^ea^ brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ avidūre aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle sasīsaṃ pārutaṃ nisinnaṃ; disvāna vāmena hatthena habyasesaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kamaṇḍaluṃ gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.

[03] atha kho bhagavā sundarikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa padasaddena sīsaṃ ^a^T0.0413^ea^ vivari. atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo -- ``muṇḍo ayaṃ bhavaṃ, muṇḍako ayaṃ bhava''nti tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi. atha kho sundarikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa etadahosi -- ``muṇḍāpi hi idhekacce brāhmaṇā bhavanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā jātiṃ puccheyya''nti. atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``kiṃjacco bhava''nti?
[03] atha kho bhagavā sundarikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``na brāhmaṇo nomhi na rājaputto, na vessāyano uda koci nomhi.
[22] gottaṃ pariññāya puthujjanānaṃ, akiñcano manta carāmi loke..
[21] ``saṅghāṭivāsī ^a^M0.0346^ea^ ^a^V0.0150^ea^ agaho carāmi {agiho (ka0 sī0 pī0) ageho (katthaci)}, nivuttakeso abhinibbutatto.
[22] alippamāno idha māṇavehi, akallaṃ maṃ brāhmaṇa pucchasi gottapañhaṃ''..
[21] ``pucchanti ^a^P0.0081^ea^ ve bho brāhmaṇā, brāhmaṇebhi saha brāhmaṇo no bhava''nti..
[21] ``brāhmaṇo hi ce tvaṃ brūsi, mañca brūsi abrāhmaṇaṃ.
[22] taṃ taṃ sāvittiṃ pucchāmi, tipadaṃ catuvīsatakkharaṃ..
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^T0.0414^ea^ nissitā isayo manujā, khattiyā brāhmaṇā {paṭhamapādanto} devatānaṃ.

[03] atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama! seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya -- cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti; evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito. esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca. labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada''nti. alattha kho ^a^T0.0420^ea^ sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo...pe0... arahataṃ ahosīti.

[03] ``ahañhi, bho gotama, dāyako dānapati vadaññū yācayogo; dhammena bhoge pariyesāmi; dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā dhammaladdhehi bhogehi dhammādhigatehi ekassapi dadāmi dvinnampi ^a^V0.0154^ea^ tiṇṇampi catunnampi pañcannampi channampi sattannampi aṭṭhannampi navannampi dasannampi dadāmi, vīsāyapi tiṃsāyapi cattālīsāyapi paññāsāyapi dadāmi, satassapi dadāmi, bhiyyopi dadāmi. kaccāhaṃ, bho gotama, evaṃ dadanto evaṃ yajanto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavāmī''ti ^a^T0.0421^ea^?

[03] ``taggha tvaṃ, māṇava, evaṃ dadanto evaṃ yajanto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavasi. yo kho, māṇava, dāyako dānapati vadaññū yācayogo; dhammena bhoge pariyesati; dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā dhammaladdhehi bhogehi dhammādhigatehi ekassapi dadāti...pe0... satassapi dadāti, bhiyyopi dadāti, bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatī''ti. atha kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[26] yo yācayogo dānapati {dānapatī (sī0 syā0 pī0)} gahaṭṭho, puññatthiko {puññapekho (sī0 pī0 ka0)} yajati puññapekkho.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0158^ea^ kho sabhiyassa paribbājakassa etadahosi -- ``ayampi kho samaṇo gotamo saṅghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa; yaṃnūnāhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ime pañhe puccheyya''nti.

[03] atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā attamano pamudito udaggo pītisomanassajāto ^a^P0.0100^ea^ uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi --

[21] ``antagūsi ^a^V0.0163^ea^ pāragū {pāragūsi (syā0 pī0 ka0)} dukkhassa, arahāsi sammāsambuddho khīṇāsavaṃ taṃ maññe.
[22] jutimā mutimā pahūtapañño, dukkhassantakaraṃ atāresi maṃ..
[21] ``yaṃ me kaṅkhitamaññāsi, vicikicchā maṃ tārayi namo te.
[22] muni monapathesu pattipatta, akhila ādiccabandhu soratosi..
[21] ``yā ^a^P0.0101^ea^ me kaṅkhā pure āsi, taṃ me byākāsi cakkhumā.
[22] addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tava..
[21] ``tuvaṃ ^a^T0.0436^ea^ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni.
[22] tuvaṃ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresi maṃ pajaṃ..
[21] ``puṇḍarīkaṃ ^a^M0.0363^ea^ yathā vaggu, toye na upalimpati {toyena na upalippati (sī0), toye na upalippati (pī0), toyena na upalimpati (ka0)}.
[27] evaṃ puññe ca pāpe ca, ubhaye tvaṃ na limpasi.
[22] pāde vīra pasārehi, sabhiyo vandati satthuno''ti..

[03] atha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ^a^V0.0164^ea^ -- ``abhikkantaṃ, bhante...pe0... esāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca; labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada''nti ^a^P0.0102^ea^.

[01] ``yo kho, sabhiya, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, so cattāro māse parivasati; catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti, upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya. api ca mettha puggalavemattatā viditā''ti.

[03] ``sace, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhantā pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhantā ^a^T0.0437^ea^ upasampadaṃ cattāro māse parivasanti, catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti, upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya, ahaṃ cattāri vassāni parivasissāmi; catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhubhāvāyā''ti. alattha kho sabhiyo paribbājako bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ alattha upasampadaṃ...pe0... aññataro kho panāyasmā sabhiyo arahataṃ ahosīti.

[03] evaṃ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi ^a^P0.0103^ea^ bhikkhusatehi yena āpaṇaṃ nāma aṅguttarāpānaṃ nigamo tadavasari. assosi ^a^T0.0438^ea^ kho keṇiyo jaṭilo ``samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi āpaṇaṃ anuppatto. taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ ^a^M0.0364^ea^ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā'ti {bhagavā (syā0 pī0)}. so imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti. so dhammaṃ desati ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ ^a^V0.0165^ea^ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī''ti.

[03] atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi. atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā''ti. evaṃ vutte, bhagavā keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca -- ``mahā kho, keṇiya, bhikkhusaṅgho ^a^P0.0104^ea^ aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni; tvañca brāhmaṇesu ^a^T0.0439^ea^ abhippasanno''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``kiñcāpi, bho gotama, mahā bhikkhusaṅgho aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni, ahañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno; adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavā keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca -- ``mahā kho, keṇiya, bhikkhusaṅgho aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni; tvañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno''ti.

[03] tatiyampi kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``kiñcāpi, bho gotama, mahā bhikkhusaṅgho aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni, ahañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno, adhivāsetu {adhivāsetveva (sī0)} me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā''ti. adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā ^a^M0.0365^ea^ uṭṭhāyāsanā yena sako assamo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā mittāmacce ñātisālohite āmantesi -- ``suṇantu me bhavanto mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā, samaṇo me gotamo nimantito svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena, yena me kāyaveyyāvaṭikaṃ kareyyāthā''ti. ``evaṃ, bho''ti kho keṇiyassa jaṭilassa mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā keṇiyassa jaṭilassa paṭissutvā appekacce uddhanāni khaṇanti, appekacce kaṭṭhāni phālenti, appekacce bhājanāni dhovanti, appekacce udakamaṇikaṃ patiṭṭhāpenti, appekacce āsanāni paññāpenti. keṇiyo pana jaṭilo sāmaṃyeva maṇḍalamāḷaṃ ^a^T0.0440^ea^ paṭiyādeti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena selo brāhmaṇo āpaṇe paṭivasati, tiṇṇaṃ ^a^P0.0105^ea^ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ ^a^V0.0166^ea^ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo, tīṇi ca māṇavakasatāni mante vāceti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena keṇiyo jaṭilo sele brāhmaṇe abhippasanno hoti. atha kho selo brāhmaṇo tīhi māṇavakasatehi parivuto jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami. addasā kho selo brāhmaṇo keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assame {keṇissamiye jaṭile (sī0 pī0)} appekacce uddhanāni khaṇante...pe0... appekacce āsanāni paññapente, keṇiyaṃ pana jaṭilaṃ sāmaṃyeva maṇḍalamāḷaṃ paṭiyādentaṃ. disvāna keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca -- ``kiṃ nu kho bhoto keṇiyassa āvāho vā bhavissati, vivāho vā bhavissati, mahāyañño vā paccupaṭṭhito, rājā vā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṃ balakāyenā''ti?

[03] ``na me, bho sela, āvāho vā bhavissati vivāho vā, nāpi rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṃ balakāyena; api ca kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito. atthi samaṇo gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ ^a^M0.0366^ea^ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi ^a^T0.0441^ea^ bhikkhusatehi āpaṇaṃ anuppatto. taṃ kho pana ^a^P0.0106^ea^ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ...pe0... buddho bhagavāti. so me nimantito svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā''ti. ``buddhoti, bho keṇiya, vadesi''? ``buddhoti, bho sela, vadāmi''. ``buddhoti, bho keṇiya, vadesi''? ``buddhoti, bho sela, vadāmī''ti.

[03] atha kho selassa brāhmaṇassa etadahosi -- ``ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddhoti. āgatāni kho panamhākaṃ mantesu dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā. sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto sattaratanasamannāgato. tassimāni satta ratanāni bhavanti, seyyathidaṃ -- cakkaratanaṃ, hatthiratanaṃ, assaratanaṃ, maṇiratanaṃ, itthiratanaṃ, gahapatiratanaṃ, pariṇāyakaratanameva sattamaṃ. parosahassaṃ kho panassa puttā bhavanti sūrā vīraṅgarūpā parasenappamaddanā. so imaṃ pathaviṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasati. sace kho pana agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati, arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchado {vivattacchaddo (sī0 pī0)}. kahaṃ pana, bho keṇiya, etarahi so bhavaṃ gotamo viharati ^a^T0.0442^ea^ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''ti?

[03] evaṃ ^a^V0.0167^ea^ vutte, keṇiyo jaṭilo dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ paggahetvā selaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca -- ``yenesā ^a^P0.0107^ea^, bho sela, nīlavanarājī''ti. atha kho selo brāhmaṇo tīhi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. atha kho selo brāhmaṇo te māṇavake āmantesi -- ``appasaddā bhonto āgacchantu, pade padaṃ nikkhipantā. durāsadā hi te bhagavanto {bhavanto (syā0 ka0)} sīhāva ekacarā. yadā cāhaṃ, bho, samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ manteyyuṃ, mā me bhonto antarantarā kathaṃ opātetha; kathāpariyosānaṃ me bhavanto āgamentū''ti.

[03] atha kho selo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho selo brāhmaṇo bhagavato ^a^M0.0367^ea^ kāye dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni samannesi {sammannesi (sī0 syā0)}. addasā kho selo brāhmaṇo bhagavato kāye dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni yebhuyyena ṭhapetvā dve. dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahūtajivhatāya cāti.

[03] atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me ayaṃ selo brāhmaṇo dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni yebhuyyena ṭhapetvā dve. dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahūtajivhatāya ^a^T0.0443^ea^ cā''ti. atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi {abhisaṅkhāresi (syā0 ka0)}, yathā addasa selo brāhmaṇo bhagavato kosohitaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ ^a^P0.0108^ea^. atha kho bhagavā jivhaṃ ninnāmetvā ubhopi kaṇṇasotāni anumasi paṭimasi, ubhopi nāsikasotāni anumasi paṭimasi, kevalampi nalāṭamaṇḍalaṃ jivhāya chādesi.

[03] atha kho selassa brāhmaṇassa etadahosi -- ``samannāgato kho samaṇo gotamo dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi paripuṇṇehi, no apuripuṇṇehi. no ca kho naṃ jānāmi buddho vā no vā. sutaṃ kho pana metaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ mahallakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ -- `ye te bhavanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī'ti. yaṃnūnāhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyya''nti. atha kho selo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi --
[22] pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇa..
[21] ``yesaṃ ^a^M0.0369^ea^ ^a^P0.0110^ea^ ^a^T0.0445^ea^ ve {yesaṃ vo (pī0), yassa ve (syā0)} dullabho loke, pātubhāvo abhiṇhaso.
[21] ``yo maṃ icchati anvetu, yo vā nicchati gacchatu.
[21] ``evañce {etañce (sī0 pī0)} ruccati bhoto, sammāsambuddhasāsane {sammāsambuddhasāsanaṃ (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}.

[03] alattha kho selo brāhmaṇo sapariso bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ. atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo tassā ^a^T0.0446^ea^ rattiyā accayena sake assame paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato ^a^P0.0111^ea^ kālaṃ ārocāpesi -- ``kālo, bho gotama, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta''nti ^a^V0.0170^ea^. atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0370^ea^ kho keṇiyo jaṭilo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi. atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ aññataraṃ nīcaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ bhagavā imāhi gāthāhi anumodi --
[22] rājā mukhaṃ manussānaṃ, nadīnaṃ sāgaro mukhaṃ..
[22] puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānānaṃ, saṅgho ve yajataṃ mukha''nti..

[03] atha kho bhagavā keṇiyaṃ jaṭilaṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. atha kho āyasmā selo sapariso eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasse ^a^P0.0112^ea^ ...pe0... ^a^T0.0447^ea^ aññataro kho panāpasmā selo sapariso arahataṃ ahosi.
[03] atha kho āyasmā selo sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``yaṃ taṃ saraṇamāgamha {māgamma (sī0 syā0 ka0)}, ito aṭṭhami cakkhuma.
[21] ``tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni.
[22] tuvaṃ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresimaṃ pajaṃ..
[22] pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno''ti..
[21] na ^a^P0.0113^ea^ hi so upakkamo atthi, yena jātā na miyyare.
[22] jarampi ^a^T0.0448^ea^ patvā maraṇaṃ, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino..
[21] phalānamiva pakkānaṃ, pāto patanato {papatato (sī0 pī0 aṭṭha0)} bhayaṃ.
[22] evaṃ jātāna maccānaṃ, niccaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ..
[21] daharā ca mahantā ca, ye bālā ye ca paṇḍitā.
[22] na pitā tāyate puttaṃ, ñātī vā pana ñātake..
[21] pekkhataṃ yeva ñātīnaṃ, passa lālapataṃ puthu.
[21] evamabbhāhato ^a^V0.0172^ea^ loko, maccunā ca jarāya ca.
[22] tasmā dhīrā na socanti, viditvā lokapariyāyaṃ..
[21] yassa maggaṃ na jānāsi, āgatassa gatassa vā.
[22] sammūḷho hiṃsamattānaṃ, kayirā ce naṃ vicakkhaṇo..
[21] na hi ruṇṇena sokena, santiṃ pappoti cetaso.
[22] na ^a^T0.0449^ea^ tena petā pālenti, niratthā paridevanā..
[21] yena yena hi maññanti, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
[21] api vassasataṃ jīve, bhiyyo vā pana māṇavo.
[22] ñātisaṅghā vinā hoti, jahāti idha jīvitaṃ..
[22] petaṃ kālaṅkataṃ disvā, neso labbhā mayā iti..
[27] evampi dhīro sapañño, paṇḍito kusalo naro.

[03] evaṃ ^a^P0.0115^ea^ ^a^T0.0450^ea^ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe. tena kho pana samayena sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā brāhmaṇamahāsālā icchānaṅgale paṭivasanti, seyyathidaṃ -- caṅkī brāhmaṇo, tārukkho brāhmaṇo, pokkharasāti brāhmaṇo, jāṇussoṇi {jāṇusoṇi (ka0)} brāhmaṇo, todeyyo brāhmaṇo, aññe ca abhiññātā abhiññātā brāhmaṇamahāsālā. atha kho vāseṭṭhabhāradvājānaṃ māṇavānaṃ ^a^M0.0373^ea^ jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamantānaṃ anuvicarantānaṃ {anucaṅkamamānānaṃ anuvicaramānānaṃ (sī0 pī0)} ayamantarākathā udapādi -- ``kathaṃ, bho, brāhmaṇo hotī''ti?

[03] bhāradvājo māṇavo evamāha -- ``yato kho, bho, ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena, ettāvatā kho bho brāhmaṇo hotī''ti.

[03] vāseṭṭho māṇavo evamāha -- ``yato kho, bho, sīlavā ca hoti vatasampanno {vattasampanno (sī0 syā0 ma0 ni0 2.454)} ca, ettāvatā kho, bho, brāhmaṇo hotī''ti. neva kho asakkhi bhāradvājo māṇavo vāseṭṭhaṃ ^a^P0.0116^ea^ māṇavaṃ saññāpetuṃ, na pana asakkhi vāseṭṭho māṇavo bhāradvājaṃ māṇavaṃ saññāpetuṃ.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0174^ea^ kho vāseṭṭho māṇavo bhāradvājaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesi -- ``ayaṃ kho, bho {ayaṃ bho (sī0 syā0 ka0), ayaṃ kho (pī0)} bhāradvāja, samaṇo gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā ^a^T0.0451^ea^ pabbajito icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe; taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi...pe0... buddho bhagavā'ti. āyāma, bho bhāradvāja, yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ etamatthaṃ pucchissāma. yathā no samaṇo gotamo byākarissati tathā naṃ dhāressāmā''ti. ``evaṃ, bho''ti kho bhāradvājo māṇavo vāseṭṭhassa māṇavassa paccassosi.

[03] atha kho vāseṭṭhabhāradvājā māṇavā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu. sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vāseṭṭho māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi --

[03] evaṃ me sutaṃ -- ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde. tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase ^a^M0.0391^ea^ puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti ^a^P0.0140^ea^. atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi --

[03] ```ye te, bhikkhave, kusalā dhammā ariyā niyyānikā sambodhagāmino, tesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ariyānaṃ niyyānikānaṃ sambodhagāmīnaṃ kā upanisā savanāyā'ti iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu, te evamassu vacanīyā -- `yāvadeva dvayatānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇāyā'ti. kiñca dvayataṃ vadetha?

[03] (1) ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti ayamekānupassanā. ayaṃ dukkhanirodho, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti, ayaṃ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā dvayatānupassino kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ -- diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā ^a^T0.0474^ea^ upādisese anāgāmitā''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavā. idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --
[27] yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṃ, asesaṃ uparujjhati.

[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0191^ea^ ca dukkhaṃ pajānanti, atho dukkhassa sambhavaṃ.
[27] yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṃ, asesaṃ uparujjhati.
[22] bhabbā te antakiriyāya, na te jātijarūpagā''ti..

[03] (2) ```siyā aññenapi pariyāyena sammā dvayatānupassanā'ti, iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu; `siyā'tissu vacanīyā. kathañca siyā? yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti sabbaṃ upadhipaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā. upadhīnaṃ ^a^M0.0392^ea^ tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṃ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā...pe0... athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --
[27] yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karoti, punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando.
[22] tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā, dukkhassa jātippabhavānupassī''ti..

[03] (3) ```siyā aññenapi pariyāyena sammā dvayatānupassanā'ti, iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu; `siyā'tissu vacanīyā. kathañca siyā? yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti sabbaṃ avijjāpaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā. avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṃ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā...pe0... athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --
[22] vijjāgatā ca ye sattā, na te gacchanti {nāgacchanti (sī0 pī0)} punabbhava''nti..

[03] (4) ``siyā aññenapi...pe0... kathañca siyā? yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti sabbaṃ saṅkhārapaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā. saṅkhārānaṃ tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṃ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā...pe0... athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --

[03] (6) ``siyā aññenapi...pe0... kathañca siyā? yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti sabbaṃ phassapaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā. phassassa tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṃ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā...pe0... athāparaṃ etadavoca ^a^T0.0477^ea^ satthā --
[21] ``ye ca phassaṃ pariññāya, aññāyupasame {paññāya upasame (syā0)} ratā.

[03] (7) ``siyā ^a^V0.0193^ea^ aññenapi...pe0... kathañca siyā? yaṃ kiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti sabbaṃ vedanāpaccayāti, ayamekānupassanā. vedanānaṃ tveva asesavirāganirodhā natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti, ayaṃ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā...pe0... athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --

[22] nirodhe ^a^T0.0481^ea^ ye vimuccanti, te janā maccuhāyino''ti..

[21] ``anattani attamāniṃ {attamānī (syā0), attamānaṃ (pī0 ka0)}, passa lokaṃ sadevakaṃ.

[03] (16) ```siyā aññenapi pariyāyena sammā dvayatānupassanā'ti, iti ce, bhikkhave, pucchitāro assu; `siyā'tissu vacanīyā. kathañca siyā? yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya idaṃ sukhanti upanijjhāyitaṃ, tadamariyānaṃ etaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ, ayamekānupassanā ^a^T0.0482^ea^. yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa...pe0... sadevamanussāya idaṃ dukkhanti upanijjhāyitaṃ tadamariyānaṃ etaṃ sukhanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ, ayaṃ ^a^M0.0397^ea^ dutiyānupassanā. evaṃ sammā dvayatānupassino kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ -- diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitāti. idamavoca bhagavā. idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā --
[21] ``rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phassā dhammā ca kevalā.

[21] tasmā jantu sadā sato, kāmāni parivajjaye.
[22] te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva {siñcitvā (sī0)} pāragūti..
[21] satto ^a^V0.0200^ea^ ^a^T0.0485^ea^ guhāyaṃ bahunābhichanno, tiṭṭhaṃ naro mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho.
[22] dūre ^a^P0.0152^ea^ vivekā hi tathāvidho so, kāmā hi loke na hi suppahāyā..

[21] tasmā hi sikkhetha idheva jantu, yaṃ kiñci jaññā visamanti loke.
[22] na tassa hetū visamaṃ careyya, appañhidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā..

[21] vadanti ^a^M0.0401^ea^ ^a^V0.0201^ea^ ^a^T0.0487^ea^ ve duṭṭhamanāpi eke, athopi ve saccamanā vadanti.
